pullRequest.title: Added Exceptions to Temporal
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #, if available:
Description of changes:
By submitting this pull request, I confirm that my contribution is made under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license.

nodes.bodyText:
It would be better to throw exceptions early here instead of returning null. This "erases" information, going from a detailed failure, to a generic null state.
Same for other deserializers

I believe throws JsonParseException needs to stay here, since this method can still throw a JsonParseException?
Same for the other similar methods.
Suggested change * scalar.git fetch upstream * scalar.
